msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides; the papyrus is broken from the beginning of the column at the top and the bottom, also there are some damages and lacunae at the result of four folds. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. (MA)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Ama[ alias Lucia] sluice of Loukia

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

on the produce of olive oil 4 drachmas, 5 obols, naubion 4 drachmas, 4.5 obols, surcharges 11 drachmas, 5.5 obols, 2 chalkoi;;eparourion 33 drachmas, 5 obols, 2 chalkoi, surcharges 2 drachmas, 4 obols, kollybos 1 drachma, 4..5 obols, the total 107 drachmas, 4.5 obols, 2 chalkoi;;geometria for the 12th year 119 drachmas, 4 obols, surcharges 7 drachmas, 3 obols, the total 127 drachmas, 1
